name: Perdition (KingsEndStudios)
description:
Created By: Mike Morrone && Corey King

Set in 3026 humans finally understand their place when dealing with the superior computer overlords, well not all human.  Meet Corey, he doesn't understand why you don't try to break out of the most high secure prison ever.  

Try your best to help him escape the scariest prison he will ever see, his own mind.
